/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Test for simple addition with MOV (2 + 4 = 6)
//  MOV R0, #2
//  MOV R1, #4
//  NOP
//  NOP
//  NOP
//  ADD R1, R1, R0
--------------------------------
--------------------------------
Cond    I OpCo S Rn   Rd   Op2
1110 00 1 1101 0 0000 0000 000000000010 // MOV (imm)
1110 00 1 1101 0 0000 0001 000000000100 // MOV (imm)

1110 11 0 0000 0 0000 0000 000000000000 // NOP
1110 11 0 0000 0 0000 0000 000000000000 // NOP
1110 11 0 0000 0 0000 0000 000000000000 // NOP

Cond    I OpCo S Rn   Rd   Shift    Rm
1110 00 0 0100 0 0001 0001 00000000 0000 // ADD (reg)
-------------------------------
IMEM:
11100011101000000000000000000010
11100011101000000001000000000100
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11100000100000010001000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000
11101100000000000000000000000000

Expected Results:
R0 = 2
R1 = 6
